General.Name: SciVision Biotech Inc
General.Description: SciVision Biotech Inc. manufactures and sells hyaluronic acid products in Taiwan. It offers synovial fluid supplements, facial dermal implants, absorbable adhesion barriers, and intravesical instillation products. The company was founded in 2001 and is based in Kaohsiung, Taiwan.

1.Name: Ru Ling  Guo
1.Title: VP, Financial Officer, Accounting Officer & Corp. Governance Officer
